Improper Eating Spoils the Disposition.--Many spoil their dispositions by eating improperly. We should be 

618 

just as careful to learn the lessons of health reform as we are to have our studies perfectly prepared, for the habits that we adopt in this direction are helping to form our characters for the future life. It is possible for one to spoil his spiritual experience by an ill-usage of the stomach.-- Lt 274, 1908 (CD 126.)
